title: New: Slime – First Cape
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/slimeuse-900x602.jpg "slimeuse")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8476-new-slime-first-cape/attachment/slimeuse/)

The release of [**Slime**](http://www.facebook.com/SlimeMusic)‘s debut EP, _Increases_, is just around the corner. On **June 27** the much-hyped South London producer will have shown all his cards, but for now we’ll have to make do with his new track, _First Cape_. It’s an awkward little tune; it pops with an uncontrolled melancholy, with the haunting vocals and low-fi clarinet tones sounding unimagined and flat. Yet despite all this, it finds a grace and fluidity in the mangled and mismatched snippets of sadness, ultimately it finds hope. Listen Below.

 [Slime – First Cape](http://soundcloud.com/slime-music/first-cape) by [Slime Music](http://soundcloud.com/slime-music)
